concept.title: Business Rules
concept.shortdesc: Business rules represent the guidelines used in the day-to-day operations of your business organization. These rules are used to configure UltiPro to meet your business needs.

conbody.p: The data used to process employee information and run payrolls requires tables to be built and definitions to be created, defining company business rules. Organization and maintenance of data in business rules affects UltiPro administration and reports.
Business rules may pertain to jobs, deduction/benefit plans, and/or earnings. You can add, modify, or delete codes, descriptions, and other data within the business rule.

Business rules can be country-specific. You can have the same business rule with different approval levels for different countries. Workflow administrators manage business rules based on security privileges and company features when changes are required.
